OmniProcessOmniAsmtTask.name: OmniProcessOmniAsmtTask
OmniProcessOmniAsmtTask.description: Represents a junction between an omni process and an omni assessment task.

LastReferencedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user referenced this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user viewed this record.

Name.description: The name of the omni process omni assessment task record.

OmniAssessmentTaskId.description: The omni assessment task record associated with the omni process.

OmniProcessId.description: The omni process record associated with the omni assessment task when it is executed.

OwnerId.description: ID of the omni process omni assessment task record owner.
